sentences.en: a desperate bid to quench the raging flames
sentences.cn: 为扑灭熊熊大火而不顾一切的努力

sentences.en: A stag, one summer's day, came to a pool to quench his thirst.
sentences.cn: 夏季里有一天, 一只公鹿来到池边喝水.

sentences.en: Distant water cannot quench a fire nearby.
Does it take the whole Nile to quench your thirst?
sentences.cn: 你要喝乾整条尼罗河的水才能止渴 吗 ?

sentences.en: Firemen tried to quench the flames raging through the building.
sentences.cn: 消防队员奋力扑救大楼中熊熊的火焰。

sentences.en: Foul water as soon as fair will quench hot fire.
Having a bottle of soft drink is not enough to quench my thirst.
He bought an ice - cream to quench his thirst.
sentences.cn: 为了解渴,他买了一块冰淇淋.

sentences.en: He stopped to quench his thirst at a stream.
sentences.cn: 他停了下来，在小溪边饮水止渴。

sentences.en: He would quench the sunny moment, bring trouble on himself, and accomplish nothing.
sentences.cn: 这会把这个乐融融的时刻破坏, 给自己带来麻烦, 结果一事无成.

sentences.en: I at an log hotel to quench a desert thirst.
sentences.cn: 为了缓解沙漠之渴,我来到了一家木屋旅馆歇脚.

sentences.en: Instead of tea or coffee, drink water to quench your thirst.
sentences.cn: 渴了喝水，别喝茶或咖啡。

sentences.en: Nothing could quench her longing to return home again.
sentences.cn: 她重返家园的念头怎麽也打消不掉.

sentences.en: The firemen were unable to quench the fire.
sentences.cn: 消防人员无法扑灭这场大火.

sentences.en: The waters can not quench it.
Then the men of David sware unto him, saying, Thou shalt go no more out with us to battle, that thou quench not the light of Israel.
sentences.cn: 当日，跟随大卫的人向大卫起誓说，以后你不可再与我们一同出战，恐怕熄灭以色列的灯。

sentences.en: To quench steel is that hot steel is quenched to harden it.
sentences.cn: 淬钢就是烧热的钢置入水中骤冷使之坚硬.

sentences.en: We stopped at a small bar to quench our thirst.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家小酒吧停下来喝点东西解渴。

words.tran_cn: 难熄灭的；难压制的；难镇静的
[机] 淬火；抑制；[物] 猝熄

trans.tran_en: to stop a fire from burning

trans.tran_cn: 解（渴），终止（某事物），（用水）扑灭（火焰等），将（热物体）放入水中急速冷却
trans.tran_en: to stop a fire from burning
